Hi there!

I'm David; a typography lover, web designer, and musician. Doing web design for 8 years with specialty in minimal design and web typography. I deliver good looking and readable text on-screen. Currently a BA student in President University.

Colophon

Testing and design process made possible using Web Maker. Coded on Atom. This site built on Jekyll, a static-site generator. Hosted via Github Pages.

Big fan on Helvetica-like-font, but it sucks. Therefore, typefaces set on Acumin designed by Robert Slimbach.
